title: Fix for 'unable to connect to server' (WIN 7)
body:
If your having an error similar to this:

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1420795095323/ScreenShot2015-01-09at5.13.59pm.png

When you know your internet is working perfectly. This will usually occur when you have recently used a proxy, It can be confusing because you might have disabled or uninstalled the proxy server but the error still occurs.


Go to network and sharing center


2. Search for internet options on the top right search panel

3. Click on internet options

4. Click on connections tab (top list)

5. Click on lAN settings

6. Check the 'automatically detect settings' box.
